thread.title: Hollyoaks 20th anniversary: Kim Butterfield is at the centre of a Gloved Hand Killer cover-up - Hollyoaks Soaps
thread.title_full: Hollyoaks 20th anniversary: Kim Butterfield is at the centre of a Gloved Hand Killer cover-up - Hollyoaks News - Soaps - Digital Spy

author: Daniel Kilkelly
title: Hollyoaks 20th anniversary: Kim Butterfield is at the centre of a Gloved Hand Killer cover-up - Hollyoaks Soaps
text: Warning: This article contains spoilers from Tuesday's E4 first look episode that some readers may prefer to avoid.The Gloved Hand Killer mystery is nearing its climax on Hollyoaks, and all eyes will surely now be on Kim Butterfield after the show's latest E4 first look airing.The unknown villain has already claimed two more victims this week, but the show's latest episode saw another cover-up begin at Dee Valley Hospital after police became involved in the case. © Lime PicturesThe Gloved Hand Killer In scenes just broadcast on E4, Cindy Cunningham visited the police station and told DS Thorpe everything she knows about the Gloved Hand Killer following the recent deaths of Ashley Davidson and Dr S'Avage.In a rare show of competence from the local police force, DS Thorpe took Cindy's claims seriously and arrived at Dee Valley to investigate.Unfortunately, looking into the mysterious deaths won't be easy for Thorpe as someone had burned the patient records for all of the Gloved Hand's victims.Thorpe also demanded to see Ashley Davidson's body, but it was moved from the mortuary and sent off to be cremated. In a shock moment, we soon saw that Kim was responsible for the sneaky activity. © Lime Pictures © Lime Pictures © Lime PicturesKim embarks on a cover-up Does this mean that Kim is the Gloved Hand Killer? Is she covering for her sister Lindsey or one of the other hospital staff members? We'll find out tomorrow (October 21) at 7pm on E4 when the Gloved Hand claims their third victim of the week and is officially unmasked.Hollyoaks is celebrating its 20th anniversary all this week on Channel 4 and E4.Hollyoaks 20th anniversary: We rank the Gloved Hand Killer suspects as the big reveal gets closerHollyoaks boss Bryan Kirkwood: 'We've always known who the Gloved Hand Killer was'Read more Hollyoaks spoilers and newsDigital Spy Soap Scoop video - hit play below for gossip on EastEnders' Halloween special, Nikhil's Emmerdale return, the Nightingale family's arrival in Hollyoaks and a new romance story for Mary in Coronation Street. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4565610458001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14565610458001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4565610458001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4565610458001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14565610458001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4565610458001.init(); ai_type="video"; } Get the Inside Soap magazine on your iPhone or iPad
